meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: A Search for a Strategy Representative Henry J. Hyde, the head of the House Judiciary Committee, and 12 colleagues will meet to begin planning how to prosecute President Clinton. Page A14.
A Search for a Strategy Representative Henry J. Hyde, the head of the House Judiciary Committee, and 12 colleagues will meet to begin planning how to prosecute President Clinton. Page A14.
Five N.F.L. Coaches Fired In a day of shake-ups in pro football, five coaches were dismissed in six hours. That makes seven coaching vacancies, counting the new Browns. SportsTuesday, page D1.
Storm Kills 5 in Yacht Race Five sailors were confirmed dead by Australian maritime officials and one was missing after a storm with 90-mile-an-hour winds blasted the Sydney-to-Hobart race. Page D2.
